LJCDataColumns.summary: Represents a typed Collection of LJCDataColumn objects.
LJCDataColumns.remarks:
It extends (inherits) from class LJCCollectionLib-LJCCollectionBase which provides the "foreach" and "count" functionality.

It includes an AddObject() method that requires the strongly typed LJCDataColumn object collection element. This is what makes the collection strongly typed.

The Get() method retrieves the internal array element by key.

Add.summary: Creates an object and adds it to the collection.

AddObject.summary: Adds an object and key value.

Retrieve.summary: Retrieves the item by Key value.

GetColumns.summary: Get the column definitions that match the property names.
GetColumns.returns: The definitions for the specified properties.

MapNames.summary: Sets the PropertyName, RenameAs and Caption values for a column.
